posts.content: Oh no, what happened to it?

The AA man recons I've damaged or broken some of the fingers on the pressure plate, but I won't know this for sure untill the whole comes out again sometime next week. This is not what I need 4 weeks before it suppose to be going to France in it!!

Better now than when in France though!

Seems strange though, was it a used pressure plate?

Yes, it's was paul! You live and learn.

I'm looking into getting a heavy duty clucth and pressure plate for it now.

So I've ordered a new clutch and hopefuly it will be with me tomorrow!

So I've started to unbolt the exhaust, tow bar and few other little bits when I notice the rear drivers outer cv joint completly unbolted from the outer hub, all the bolts are ther but not connected, very strange it managed to work itself loose!

Why is that?
Must use some lock tight next time!!

Well it's true!

You need to have both drive shafts fasterned to move a Porsche gearbox!!

I've been looking at the rear camber on the van and noticed the top of the wheels slowly tipping more & more inwards.

I removed the rear offside wheel to find the uniball bar with a slight curve!!

great thread family van! i,m now in the process of putting a 1z diesel in my split, can i ask where did you get your custom radiator, what size is it , is it doing the job ok, and was it expensive?



al

Well the time has come for my little van to move along to a new home,

however with such a unique build i am having a few issues putting a price on it

Can you guys help me with my little problem.

the van does need a little body work however it does have some fantastic one of engineering

full spec to follow

Thanks in advance.

Hi Ste, sad to hear the vans going.. sounds like your sick of breaking down, is that the reason or something else?

My vans valued at Â£25000 for insurance purposes, but I have to admit I don't keep an eye on bus prices these days.

Graham

The reason for sale is too many hobbies not enough time. Most of the wrinkles have been ironed out of the van now, so now that I'm having no problems with it it seems mad to sell it but such is life.

The paint work does need some attention on my van as I have concentrated on the running set up.

Thanks for the reply graham.
